Question: In August 1998, this person returned to Saturday night television with The ____ Radio Show.
Hints: This person, who was unpaid when production ceased, accused the studio of breach of contract, fraud and negligent representation.
This person hosted his first pay-per-view event on February 27, 1988 named This person's Negligeé and Underpants Party.
In 2002, this person acquired the rights to comedy films Rock 'n' Roll High School (1979) and Porky's (1982).
